section:
== Example of an JSON
An JSON object is a set of key / value pairs which starts with "{" and ends with "}".
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="./examples/json/person.txt[] ----
Lists are one or more values surrounded by [] and separated by ",".
<xi:include xmlns:xi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XInclude" parse="text" href="./examples/json/persons.txt[] ----
